reasoning: Reporting incidence at birth (per 100k births). Overall ectodermal dysplasia has incidence of approximately 7 per 10,000 births (70 per 100k). Congenital ectodermal dysplasia of face is a specific phenotypic presentation of broader ED spectrum. Confidence limited by umbrella nature of parent condition.
source: Orphanet Ectodermal dysplasia database; Prevalence rates for ectodermal dysplasia syndromes. PubMed. 2024
